species.name: dewpider
descriptions: Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it comes onto land in search of food, it takes water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.
It can only breathe oxygen that has dissolved in water, so it wears a water bubble on its head when it walks around on land.
It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.
It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
When it comes across enemies or potential prey, this Pok√©mon smashes its water-bubble-covered head into them.

abilities.name: water-bubble
abilities.effect: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
